website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality bait station focused on ridding customers of all types of cockroaches.
pros: Kills roaches of all kinds and sizes
Many buyers raved about how fast this bait station helped rid their home of hundreds of roaches
Slow-active ingredients allows roaches to take the bait back to their colonies
cons: Not the best option for exterminating smaller roaches

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this. The first time i was finding dead roaches daily and the bait stations were empty but a month or so later i will still finding live ones so i purchased again. I live in apt complex that has a reputation for roaches so i thought one more round would work. Well i dont know if they were expired or what but it didnt work, roaches didnt even touch the bait. I shared both orders with my boyfriend who also lives in an apartment complex and he said the same thing. I will be contacting the seller since the baits were untouched
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Willis

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job Done!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!! I thought we would never get rid of them!!! From professional Exterminators to bottles and bottles of raid Pine-Sol bleach powders and sprays. Nothing was working!!! I was at my last straw. I was ready to just move out leave it all to be set on fire! So I bought this based on the the reviews thought why not try it?! And just Wow!! I’m so thankful for this product!!! I’m actually gaining my house back. Best stuff ever!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in a plastic non resealable package like a mailing envelope
customer_reviews.text: Beware. Counterfeit item. Arrived in a plastic non resealable package like a mailing envelope. Label was obviously photocopied and in black and white. Double sided tape was tossed in package and was stuck to everything.
customer_reviews.author: LesahS

customer_reviews.title: These were amazing. They did what an exterminator every two weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing. They did what an exterminator every two weeks could not....get rid of the roaches! I live in a multi-family dwelling and the roaches were a constant source of irritation. The exterminators hired by management were ineffective, but these baits worked very quickly. Informed management they should buy these for the whole complex.
customer_reviews.author: Pernette B.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my in-laws because their neighbors tore down an abandoned home. When the house was demolished, my in-laws became overwhelmed with German cockroaches! They tried everything you could buy at the retail chains, but nothing worked. So I found this on Amazon and figured we would give it a shot. After the first 24 hours, they came home from work to find hundreds of dead roaches and hundreds more on the brink of death. After a couple months they are now bug free!
customer_reviews.author: Gene Patton

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty roach control
customer_reviews.text: These baits actually work... and keep working! I moved into a new house and there were roaches all over the kitchen. I used some other products (mainly borax and home depot roach gel to no avail). 2 weeks after putting these baits out, there was not even one roach left.
customer_reviews.author: Surgeon Rick

customer_reviews.title: Roaches not drawn to bait
customer_reviews.text: Roaches are not drawn to the bait at all. In fact, they seem to steer clear of it. I’m not sure if I received a bad batch, but these bait stations aren’t working at all. I also had to break the tops off to ensure the roaches could eat the bait. Still nothing. I’ve placed a lot on the kitchen counter and bathroom floors where they frequent, and they just walk around it.
customer_reviews.author: LLL

customer_reviews.title: Works works works worth the cost and will save u money it destroys them
customer_reviews.text: Someone brought furniture in when we were nice and let them stay we tried everything from exterminator to spraying ourselves we had German for ten years and we would think we were getting rid of them then bam back full force I had almost given up of ever getting rid of them when a friend told me about this product on amazon so thought might as well we tried everything else in ten years even tried diatomaceous earth we ordered this and omg it worked we have been roach free over two years we noticed a difference with a week we left bait down as procaution against them coming back and have not seen any
customer_reviews.author: patricia pratt

customer_reviews.title: BEST ROACH KILLER EVER
customer_reviews.text: So we have had a problem with roaches for about a year now and have tried everything to get rid of them. No matter what we bought or how much we cleaned they would not go away. I finally broke and spent the money because I could not stand it anymore. Holy god send!!! Within 24 hours they were coming out and dying. It's been about 4/5 days and it looks like a war field of roaches on my floor. We are sweeping 2-3 times a days that's how many it is killing, even the babies. I never write reviews but this was 100% worth writing. Do yourself a favor and buy these, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Works Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!!! My family member was infested with roaches. Within 2 weeks you could see a drastic difference. I couldn't believe it. The only thing I can say bad (and it's not really bad) is I wish the bait holder in the arena was bigger. In less than a month all the bait in them had been eaten. THIS PRODUCT IS BY FAR THE BEST ROACH KILLER I'VE EVER PURCHASED!!! I WOULD RECOMMEND TO EVEN THE WORST CASES OF INFESTATION!! WORTH EVERY PENNY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Smithbmjj

customer_reviews.title: OMG-Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: I am a very clean/ocd type of person. Never, ever had I have to fight cockroaches since moving to las vegas nv. I have exotic birds so spraying chemicals isn't a option. I keep up on sweeping floors, cleaning cages, removing food dishes at night but still after almost 3 years nothing was working. i know more about German cockroaches then I ever wanted to know. These bait traps are first product to actually start reducing the amount of bugs I see. Highly recommended. They were a suggestion from my pest control company.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: so glad I bought these
customer_reviews.text: After trying many other baits, I finally thought what's one more try. so glad I bought these, our neighbors filled their basement and attic up with trash for over a year. then when the landlord found out they had it all removed everyone on two blocks was overrun with roaches. after putting these out along with some of the gel made by the same company we are bug-free.
customer_reviews.author: shutter bug

customer_reviews.title: This Works Very Well!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It has been almost a month now that I put 60 baits out in my 22x10 kitchen. I was desperate. Roaches had come in with SAMS boxes over the years. German and the the other kind. They practically waved at me from every drawer I opened. My paid exterminator could not get rid of them. THIS WORKS. I let the traps work. The instructions say don't kill them. Let them stumble back to the nest. I only see one every so often but confident the old and wise and stubborn ones will die here soon. I will order again. No odor or mess with these little circle baits. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Zera Brown

customer_reviews.title: DEAD, DYING, WILL PERISH SOON
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly functioning as I hoped. I have gone to bed and woke up to numerous DEAD ROACHES on the floor, which granted was nasty, but ecstatic for their DEATH!! It has been a couple of weeks and it continues amaze me how quick this is taking them out. The other night I saw one wondering around drunken and lost, normally they scurry away when I try to get them, but this guy was dying in front of my eyes, so I caught it and ended the misery. I just wished I shot a video. Hopefully, I can add one later, if I encounter any more drunken roaches. Highly recommend and follow suggested layout.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works best when supported
customer_reviews.text: Within a week of me using this product, my home is now insect free! When I did see some roaches, they were on their last leg trying to figure out what happened. The key with this product is making sure you do a thorough cleaning your space, close off any entry points, remove any water supply and then throw this bait out. The roaches have no other choice but to eat the bait. Pair this with gentrol and you home will once again belong to you. I was also vigilant and cleaned my counter tops, vacuumed my floors, and threw out my trash every night. It’s a process, but we’ll worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Anglin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: We had a severe roach problem. For over 3 years we battle those little cockroaches they were everywhere. I could not leave anything on the counter, we could not eat at our table the infestation was bad. I did a little research and found this product online with good reviews. I hesitated over the cost but I gave it a try. It is worth every penny. I can not tell you how quickly this product worked. For the first time we sat down to dinner and had no invaders. I also bought the caulking along with this bait. It works.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette B.

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I was seeing roaches in my home. I thought that instead of having to go around with a spray that this would be better. I find the product to be useless, I have them all around the home and yet I still see roaches. I opened the cabinet today for a cup and there was a roach. I have a bait in the cabinet but yet it did nothing. I bought this product because the reviews were good but for me it was a waste of my money and time. zero stars but the review will not post unless I click at least one.
customer_reviews.author: Fayetteville GA

customer_reviews.title: Purchased after the gel syringes
customer_reviews.text: So here's the thing about these, I was real exited to have these with the syringes, which by the way worked awsome!!! But I put these after and just really didn't pull anything in, the remainding roaches didn't really bother with em and would just walk around them. I'd rather stick with the syringes
customer_reviews.author: Katkiller13Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These work quite well and the set up is easy. You just need to make sure you keep ...
customer_reviews.text: These work quite well and the set up is easy. You just need to make sure you keep them in a temperate climate once the package is opened so the bait doesn't dry out. My property isn't infested as some other users here, but I am already seeing evidence of this products success. I anticipate as the summer gets hotter, I will see more cockroaches, so I will update with its continued results.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: This stuff kills generations of cockroaches!
customer_reviews.text: Every summer I notice large ugly cockroaches making their way into the house from the garage area. So I put 6 or so out and when I checked back, this stuff had killed generations! I saw adult and baby cockroaches dead on the floor near this stuff. So it definitely does what is says it will do! I recommend putting out a lot of these at a time to attract their entire family! I hate big nasty roaches and seeing the baby roaches dead means they won't be creeping up into my house!
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: It works well, fast results!
customer_reviews.text: It works! You'll see results the same day as laying out traps. I moved into a place and soon realized there were occasional cockroaches appearing, babies and adults. Two types of roach breeds too. I ordered this stuff put some in the basement, around my house outside and under the fridge and stove and stairwell by a crack in the floor where I've seen them escape to. The same day I saw extra roaches but they were attracted to the bait, within mins. I saw them staggering away dieing.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Effectively kills roaches and eliminates colonies.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the pack with 60 traps. I threw about half around the kitchen, dinning area and living room. In about 3 days I have noticed that there were fewer roaches scouring round whenever I turned on the lights at night. Granted we have a mild infestation, but they just wont go away no matter how well we tried to keep everything clean. This uses professional poisons, therefore I decided on the bait traps rather than tube because of less risk to accidental exposure. The only downside to this product is my fault -- I SHOULD HAVE BOUGHT THIS SOONER THAN LATER.
customer_reviews.author: Fundamental

customer_reviews.title: saved from the Germans!!! cockroaches that is!
customer_reviews.text: I have been plagued with cockroaches for the past 2 years. i have bought every professional product for control of these obnoxious creatures, Nothing worked. i ordered these bait stations and some powder that stayed non packing. two weeks later and hardly a live cockroach is in site, Dead ones everywhere. some babies are showing up so I will have to see if they are big enough to eat the bait.
customer_reviews.author: marguerite paduano

customer_reviews.title: This bugs me
customer_reviews.text: These so called bait traps did not work at all..not one roach died. I bought the advion gel again and that worked better. But the last batch was way better .this one wasn't the same cuz I still see bugs around. The first time I bought the advion. Gel it was amazing! I didn't see one bug for over six months.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at how well this worked, wow!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, yay!!!! I bought these baits as a last-ditch effort, having very little hope they'd truly help my serious, more-on-than-off roach problem (I've tried others before and was unimpressed — they just didn't seem to do much...). But about a month after putting them out, I suddenly realized.... hey, no more roaches! Like, anywhere! I just bought another bag, hope they keep working — fantastic product, really life-changing! (Btw, I also bought the gel but haven't gotten around to using it yet, not sure I even need it now? I've also tried diatomaceous earth and sprays, meh...)
customer_reviews.author: N'sphere

customer_reviews.title: This actually works. Like ACTUALLY
customer_reviews.text: I found cockroaches for months. Finally I caved and I moved. Once I moved to my new apartment I realize that I brought them with me. They send an exterminator but two weeks later we still had them. I know these guys multiply add an ever evolving rate, so I was so scared. I almost completely lost hope and was going to move again and throw away everything. Someone recommended this product and it changed my life. They were gone within two weeks and I now have a normal home with no pass. If you feel like giving up try this it’s your last hope but I wish it was your first step
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Saghbazarian

customer_reviews.title: One roach killing system that WORK'S!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These things are GREAT! I used these after the gell baite at a family members house and he was just shocked....you have to use them in this fashion for better results about every 2 weeks. Saved him a LOT of money and the hassle of having an exterminator come in when he was at work plus the embarrassment it's saved him was everything
customer_reviews.author: kevin franklin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product to control and kill roaches.
customer_reviews.text: It Controls and kills roaches very well one of the best products in the market right now. It's the best product I've ever personally used to kill roaches. Highly recommend this product along with the surringe poison to spread around the walls and kitchen area. This product has a life span of it says 2 years I recommend after 1 year to replace it with a fresh batch that's just from personal experience. It's a bit pricey but it really works very well you won't be disappointed. Once the roaches injest this poison they look drunk and die passing on the poison to the rest of the colony.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Angel

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work one bit, seems like we have more now!
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. Didn’t work. The roaches don’t even go to the bait. I waited to see if it would actually worked and missed getting a refund by a day! Super mad that I waisted so much money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Lynn

customer_reviews.title: work very well!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a huge roach problem 1 or 2 find there way in for my plant bed outside. but outside ugh gross!! they all hide inder my plants and burrow inthe ground. I have Identified them as american cockroach and allthough maintenince sprays I feel its never effective. They came right to the bait traps I left outside and it has been 3 day I have not seen 1 cockroach outside!! get this.!!! Only thing is when i got the delivery the bag was covered in an oily substance but did noy smell like the bait inside ..which smells like dogfood
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Roe

customer_reviews.title: These are Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I had our doubts but, these work great. We live in S.E. Alabama and the roaches are terrible . The yard is packed with them and whenever it rains they come in it's hard to get rid of them but, we put some these bait traps down when we got them a few days ago and already see a reduction in the little beasties.. IT WORKS GREAT!!!!! Take my word for it ...
customer_reviews.author: Rex Howard

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works! Don't waste your money on the other products.
customer_reviews.text: We have been fighting a losing battle with German roaches for what seemed like forever. We tried every product in the stores. Some things would put a dent in them while most other items honestly did nothing. These bait containers knocked the roach population down by 95% by the end of the first week. It's been about a month or so and we will go days if not weeks without seeing a roach and the ones we have seen have been extremely tiny. I am assuming they they have not made their way to the bait yet.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hines

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a huge roach problem and read the reviews on Amazon and decided to give a go. EVERY morning and after getting home from work there were so many dead roaches I had to sweep them up. There were hundreds of them just lying there dead. I will never use any other roach remedy again. I had been spraying my house non stop and they just kept coming (when I was using a spray). I’ll never use bug spray again. The pictures posted by others are no joke. That’s what it looked like for days...massive amounts of dead roaches.
customer_reviews.author: April A Brower

customer_reviews.title: Never usually write reviews but here i had to. ...
customer_reviews.text: Never usually write reviews but here i had to. Moved into a new (to me) house. The people who lived there before me left an infestation of roaches. I sprayed all types of roach sprays but i think the roaches thought it was steroids. Then after much research i tried this product and i gotta admit, i am impressed, after the first night the number of roaches dead or dying in morning was impressive. Looking forward to becoming roach free.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Better than professional sprayers...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product same day because I was desperate. So glad I did. I layed everything out following the directions that night. I woke up in the middle of the night and found one belly up middle of the kitchen floor and a bigger one crawling to its death. As the days go on I only see one here and there but I dont see them alive. Today is day 4 and found one with wings! Definately getting to the nests. Follow directions. I flooded my kitchen and bathroom with these traps. I think the 1 stars probably didn't use them strategically. I'm a happy camper
customer_reviews.author: Cassie C.

customer_reviews.title: YAHOO, FINALLY A PRODUCT THAT REALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING PRODUCT. I LAID THEM OUT AND DURING THE FOLLOWING WEEK, I ONLY SAW A FEW ROACHES COMING OUT, DURING THE DAY, WHICH IS NOT THE NORM. THEY LOOKED LIKE THEY WERE TOTALLY DISORIENTED, JUST STANDING THERE, THEY DIDN'T EVEN BOTHER TO RUN AND HIDE, WHICH EVERYBODY KNOWS THAT IS WHAT THEY NORMALLY DO. I WAS ABLE TO KILL THEM WITHOUT ANY FUSS. IT'S ALREADY BEEN ABOUT A MONTH AND BELIEVE IT OR NOT, I HAVE NOT SEEN ANY MORE SINCE!!! YEAH!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Henry's Mom

customer_reviews.title: If you have a roach problem, this will help eliminate them and that's the truth.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bait stations. I've had professionals come and try to get rid of them and this did it in less than two weeks. I'm impressed. No fuss, no chemical smells. My wife is rarely impressed by anything but she loves them. She's looking to get rid of her biggest pest; me. I've been her biggest pest for forty years now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product. There were so many convincing great reviews that I decided to ignore the bad ones, but sure enough, just like the bad ones said, the roaches won't even touch the baits. I tried everything I could think of to get one to go in, but they are not interested whatsoever. I think we have the brown-banded cockroaches. It's been about a month and I haven't seen one dead roach and if I look inside the plastic covers it's obvious they haven't even disturbed the bait.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, got rid of 90% of German roaches ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, got rid of 90% of German roaches in a week. I recommend pairing the stations with this gel:  I placed a bunch of little tiny drops everywhere around my kitchen and it worked amazingly! I bought a pack of 10 stations and placed that around too. I see roaches ate out of them and also ate all the gel drops I placed around. This changed everything for me!
customer_reviews.author: Titi

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $
customer_reviews.text: Missed returning by a couple days. Didn't work at all! Want my $ back. this was the smallest return window of anything I've ever bought on here this is ridiculous. They say it takes 3 to 4 weeks to work but then you can't return it when you realize it's not working.
customer_reviews.author: JuBla

customer_reviews.title: This ish works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. I was skeptical at first. But man this kills half of my roach infestation in 3 days. I placed the pods all over where I've seen a roach. Next day dead roaches all over my floor. Some are walking drunk and dying. Some are laying there twitching. Bag comes with 60 pods. After the first batch I placed is gone or dried up,ill put more out. Trust me this stuff works awesome. Just gotta be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Gambit

customer_reviews.title: Easy solution, and a working solution.
customer_reviews.text: So, had a few roaches here and there. Nothing major. I'd find one every few days or so walking around. Huge ones, all of them, hard to even get with a shoe. Had to use a boot. Put twenty of these around the house and garage. I now find dead ones in the garage occasionally... But haven't seen one in the house since I two days after I put these out. Good product. Update about a month later. Haven't seen a roach... Well, at all. This is an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 2 story house and had a horrible roach problem. They were everywhere. I tried everything to get rid of them. I even tried the Avion that comes in a syringe and it helped but I still had them. Before I called the exterminator I decided to try these. I no longer have a roach problem. And it was cheaper than a exterminator. I'm going to pick up all the used ones and put out new ones to avoid any future problems.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever! Should have 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: Rental house in eastern Carolina. I saw several bugs - live and dead - as we were moving in. I bought one of those giant spray containers and covered the outside and funky crawlspace. But for the inside I used many of these little gems. I marked the first ones I put out with a gold marker. Six months later I picked them all up and put our new ones and marked them with a silver marker. They have no decreeable scent and work like a charm. I highly recommend these bait stations.
customer_reviews.author: AVAMOM

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: had roach issues for 2-3 months, tried lots of products from lowes/home depot including sprays, traps, glues, and even the gel. Got a box of the advion bait stations and put them out in the concentration that the packaging said. Saw roaches for 2-3 more days, then saw mostly stumbling and confused roaches for another week. Its now been 4 weeks or so and have only found dead roaches, haven't seen a live one at all. Great stuff, and i still have half the container left and will reapply in 6 months or so. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: david beers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fast product. Won't go back to anything else!
customer_reviews.text: Apartments aren't always perfect. We moved in and lo and behold....roaches! Argh! This product is a bit on the expensive side, but it works and works fast! Three days in, and we have only seen one and it was half dead! Will never use anything else! Next week, we will replace them....just in case all the bait has been eaten up and the buggars are still lurking somewhere. But we are very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Joyneau

customer_reviews.title: Greatest bug killer ever
customer_reviews.text: Greatest roach killer ever, The spray booms don’t work plus can’t get pets and our self out of house long enough, hand spray wasn’t getting them, So I tried this which at first I thought cost a lot till I added up how much stuff I have already bought. It’s a big bag with enough for a big house and I set them around house Saturday and Monday they are laying dead on kitchen floor but after 3 days there are No bugs anywhere
customer_reviews.author: felix larry richardson

customer_reviews.title: Finally something that works
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment where the ceiling above us completely collapsed and these critters were riddled through the pipes in the hole. I have tried everything including the exterminator and nothing worked. What I did is clean my whole apartment from top to bottom and place these near any pipes such as near the sinks, toilets, fridge, stove, by the doors and windows. It’s amazing how fast this worked within two days I saw these unwanted guest come and eat the poison and drop dead. I am finally free!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Street

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to supplement a professional spraying for what ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to supplement a professional spraying for what the bug man said was cockroaches. Personally, I have never seen a live cockroach in my home. I'm just going by what he said. I have found three dead ones since placing these all around my home. If the goal is to eradicate ANY cockroaches, then these may have helped. zoz
customer_reviews.author: zozman

customer_reviews.title: Good packaging but it didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. The bag contains a lot of bait stations and sticky tape so that you can mount therm on walls. After a week of putting the bait station all around the kitchen and cabinates I still have more roaches of different sizes. It didn’t work for me at all. Previously, I tried the tube gel. It brought all roaches out but didn’t kill them. I don’t know if this works only on some kind of roach breeds.
customer_reviews.author: YG

customer_reviews.title: I guess it works
customer_reviews.text: Put these everywhere bc my complex has issues with water bugs. Also put down bait for those deviled that are too big to fit in the little bait houses. I have to point out the opening is bigger than those on the combat large roach baits. Haven't seen one of those critters in 2 months. Figured they were working so well that I put them in the storage area a floor below me for good measure.
customer_reviews.author: VTS

customer_reviews.title: If you have a ROACH infestation PROBLEM Purchase this product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered on 04/03/2020 it arrived 04/04/2020. I put the baits out that same evening which was a Saturday. On Sunday morning and all throughout the day they kept crawling out from under the cabinets, and appliances in slow motion, some doing the death dance on their back. By day 4 - 5 the crawl outs it began slowing down. The price for the baits is really worth it when you think of ridding your home of the pests...
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After a home a few houses down was tented for pests, seems I ended up with a collection. One of the worst to combat was the German cockroaches, and my home is very clean. I did plenty of research, in lieu of calling an exterminator, and found these little gems! I put approximately 10 out, under kitchen cabinets, around the baseboards, and both the kitchen and mudroom. Within just a few weeks, there are no more critters. This product is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie Hailand

customer_reviews.title: This is not a quick kill for a bad infestation, but if you keep a few in ...
customer_reviews.text: My 'standby' for rental property, where roach infestations happen as a fact of life. This is not a quick kill for a bad infestation, but if you keep a few in each unit, it can prevent infestation. It doesn't get better than this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Old AliceTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Roaches be gone!!!
customer_reviews.text: This here is the end all be all. I killed a colony after being infested due to water damage. This is the best solution it saved My sanity. I have my house back.
customer_reviews.author: naomi cardwell

customer_reviews.title: The Germans lost this war....again
customer_reviews.text: If you live in NYC this is a must!!!! I started to notice a few of those little $h1ts in my kitchen as it got warmer this summer. I initially put out raid max and they were like rest stops for the little duckers...I decided to stop being cheap and got these guys and within a week have not seen one. Don’t cheap out : spend the extra money and just get this...it is worth it....better yet do like me and buy raid and this.
customer_reviews.author: Geno

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING. I was doubtful before purchasing it because there are so many products on the market that claim they are the best. This one is the best. I used both the baits and the gel in my mother’s home. She lives in a very old house in an area that is known to always have roaches. Typically after a fumigation the roaches would come back within 2-3 months. I put these out right after the last fumigation. We didn’t see any roaches for about a year. There are a few stragglers but that is from the neighbors not also treating their homes for pest. I definitely recommend this brand to rid your home of roaches.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: it works!
customer_reviews.text: living in Florida we thought we were doomed to roaches - disgusting Finally tried these and they worked. We put them out prior to being out of town for about 2 weeks. When we got back, found dead bugs - and no living ones. Now it is 4 months later and no bugs found!! also my dog ate one - no side effects, but you need to watch placement! (he weighs about 17 pounds). My dog eats anything, and the peanut butter scent was too wonderful for him to resist
customer_reviews.author: occasional critic

customer_reviews.title: Better get this if you wanna get rid of the roaches !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST STUFF EVER !!!!!!! Roaches are dead ever, where I cant even get them up without more dead on the floor. OMG never seen nothing like it REALLY !! I bought the gel bait too and have not even used it because this stuff has killed them all. It was sooooo worth it. I've never wrote a review but for this stuff I did. If you have a problem this will fix it fast. I have swept up over a thousand roaches that I did not even know I had in three days!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: May be working, not sure
customer_reviews.text: Solid sleek product, doesn't look like a roach-hotel. Live in Germany, still have roaches but I have less than I used to. Not sure if roaches are dead, hiding, or still there. Will keep using, and for the price, maybe buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... purchase this stuff cause I heard that it works pretty good, I gave some to my daughter because ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this stuff cause I heard that it works pretty good, I gave some to my daughter because they were having a roach problem right after she place them in the cabinet she was like wow this really works cause she doesn't see the roaches as much anymore, do anyone know if there's a spray also available and do the gel works on water bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Jar

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!! I set two baits near an infected ...
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable!! I set two baits near an infected area, not one roach since. This stuff works. UPDATE: I saw one roach medium size in my house in the kitchen, set two traps, have not seen one since. Sold and replaced stove, forgot one trap was under stove, dog got it and ate it. He is fine, thankfully.
customer_reviews.author: mh1078

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: So long story but. My landlord accidentally gave us roaches. She brought a stove in that had them in it. These killed them all! I put them under everything in the kitchen. Within the first few days, I found them dead on the floor. Oh, don't forget to clean under the stove and fridge. They go there to die.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good, clean product
customer_reviews.text: Used this more as a deterrent vs needing it, every so often we will see a roach out and about so I decided to buy something to make sure I don't need something later. Long story short, oven element went out on Christmas Eve, I pulled it away from the wall to give myself room to work and found a dead roach, I had slid one of these baits under the stove several weeks back and guessing it got one.
customer_reviews.author: Martin K.

customer_reviews.title: You can see it working!
customer_reviews.text: I have a baby and a dog, so I opted to get the roach “hotels” rather than the gel. I love the roach hotels because you can see when the roaches are actually eating it! The day after we put them out, we saw two roaches acting confused in our kitchen. They were clearly almost dead. Ever since we haven’t seen any!
customer_reviews.author: Christine B.

customer_reviews.title: I like Advion. Used the gel and it worked great ...
customer_reviews.text: I like Advion. Used the gel and it worked great after about 3 weeks using Advion gel, borax and bombs, I got rid of them. They have not come back even six months later- not even one. Had a problem with a couple other houses, and this took care of it, along with boax under fridge and stove. Like it so much, I bought these bait stations to add to my arsensil.
customer_reviews.author: Philosopher

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: It didnt do anything. The gel worked for us years ago. We moved into this new place that was already roach infected. Advion worked for us before but it is very hard to find the good gel product so we tried this one. It did nothing at all yet. It's been about 2 now. I wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Coming from someone who is trying a lot of things
customer_reviews.text: I help operate a local homeless shelter in our area and this product is by far the best I have used. Believe me I've tried many. For nearly 30 years we battled with pests that were brought into the shelter by different people but ever since using this product we have not had any problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amos Love

customer_reviews.title: Ideal with home with pets
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog and two cats and had a major roach problem but was afraid to use something that would harm the pets this product got rid of the roach problem in less than two weeks without worry of harming the pets or leaving an odor or spill that might harm them. Would recormend this product to anyone .
customer_reviews.author: Israel Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: My kind neighbor brought me a box of tomatoes which unknowingly had roaches in them. 🙁 Although I thought I caught it in time, a few months later, we had a problem. I used these baits and within a week, I was finding dead and dying roaches. I still see one every now and then and plan to buy more soon, but I tried everything you can buy at the grocery store before buying these, but none of that worked as well as this!
customer_reviews.author: Daizy1112

customer_reviews.text: I agree with all who gave this one star. I put them all out and none of the center bait bowl have been disturbed. I have noticed no dead roaches. This is a total waste of money. I agree that the company must have been instrumental in writing all the positive reviews.

The cases themselves are sturdy and serve to keep kids and pets at bay long enough to redirect them. Still disappointed in my purchase since I have to buy something else to kill these bugs

customer_reviews.text: Best EVER, put them up everywhere in places you’ve seen bugs I put 6 in kitchen, 6 in bathroom, I haven’t seen a big since. You’ll know to change for new ones when u see a bug again. Everyone in the building I live in (NYC )complains they are overwhelmed , Not me, these are the best bug killer stuff I’ve ever had.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I started using these around the outside of my house and I haven’t seen roaches in several months. And I’m talking about the huge 2 inch long flying roaches that we have in Miami. Once in a blue moon I will see one but it is dead. Amazing product will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Did I get a bad batch or something??!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s been weeks since I’ve set the arenas in my kitchen and I’ve gotten zero positive results. I even emptied out my cupboards. I’m extremely disappointed. For the price I paid, I expected SOME kind of good result. On top of that, the adhesive stickers that came with it are impossible to use! I literally ripped so many of them trying to remove the film to expose the sticky part. They were useless. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Roach destroyer!
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful in getting rid of the freaking roaches my sister brought into my home. We use gloves when handling them (to protect our skin). My pets have stayed away from them and we’ve noticed a decline in bugs! Hoping to get them all gone! Will keep using them until they are!

customer_reviews.title: 100% Worth the Money.  It works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST product that I have used for roach control. It is small, odorless, easy to put in places to keep away from pets. I have cancelled my professional extermination appointment! It's been only 6 days and I've seen a 75% less roaches running around. You have a customer for life. Thank you!

customer_reviews.text: My son moved into a apartment that had a roach problem. Bought him this and within 24 hours the problem was under control and he has only found now dead roaches. He is very pleased

customer_reviews.title: This bag may be a lifetime supply for us
customer_reviews.text: Just a few bait stations kept an apartment I had a serious roach problem with, under control for a whole year until I moved out! Just bought a house, found a lot of roaches near our entrances, pulled out a few more bait stations from the bag, and voila! Gone immediately! I've been recommending this to every friend I have who has roach problems and every time, it works like magic! They just stop showing up!
customer_reviews.author: DRob

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: moved into a rental, i saw a few bugs . I wouldn't say there was an infestation (but I wasn't going to wait and find out) I put these things everywhere! the directions said only in ares where they hide but damn that!.........I put them everywhere I could think and haven't seen anything since. I used this in combination with the tube product
customer_reviews.author: krainium

customer_reviews.title: It's Working!
customer_reviews.text: we have a problem with outdoor large, aggressive, flying roaches during the humid summer and early fall months in Hawaii. the weather conditions trigger mating swarms of what we call "B-52's" (because of their size and flying abilities) at night. since placing the advion bait traps at the farthest perimeters of our property, we have not experienced any of those swarms trying to get into our house to lay their eggs. it's been three weeks since we put the traps out, and so far, so good. will edit this review if the situation changes.
customer_reviews.author: Cindra Minakami

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after seeing the reviews on amazon and I wasn’t disappointed. We had called in pest companies to kill our German roach infestation but it never completely worked. I got this in the mail and put out the entire bag of 60 around my 2000 square ft home. 2 days later and zero roaches, I sweep up dead ones every day and every morning there are more dead ones to sweep up. This product is amazing and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ouanita Hebert

At one time, the other brand did work, but I think the roaches we had became immune to it and I needed to switch up pest control ingredients.

customer_reviews.text: I live in an NYC apartment. I treated ONCE with the injections TWO YEARS AGO. I throw a few of these bait stations around if I see one roach. I never see another. I have not finished the first 60 count pack I brought those two years ago and I have not had any reinfestation.

customer_reviews.text: wow, this stuff really works, and this 60 ct bag of preloaded bait traps is the best deal around. You can simply place the bait stations all over, including outside. Saw a few dead ones after placing, then NOTHING!!! so happy!
customer_reviews.author: eb

customer_reviews.title: It actually does what it claims to do.......kills roaches
customer_reviews.text: I like using the baits because they are easy to use.....just sit where bugs can get to it or use the included adhesive pads to place on wall, back of refrigerator, wherever you need. I've read and heard others complain that this product doesn't work. It does work.....you have to give it time to work. This is not an instant kill product. If I have a need for a roach killer in the future I will purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Works even better than I hoped it would.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. My daughter had a "bug" problem in an apartment she moved into, so I thought I'd give this a try. It is amazing to watch when you put this down. The critters were lining up to it like it was a feeding trough even while I was still standing there. It isn't long at all before you see dead critters all over the place, and just slightly longer before you begin to quit seeing live critters. I highly recommend this without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Syngenta A20378A Advion Cockroach Bait Arena Insecticide, 60Count Bag
product_meta.description: Advice cockroach bait arena is a high-performing product targeting all prevailing pest species of cockroaches, including German (also bait-adverse), American, Australian, brown, smokybrown, oriental, brown-banded & Asian cockroaches. It combines a highly attractive, proprietary formulation with a potent, non-repellent active ingredient. Cockroaches cannot resist this superior combination, & even the toughest populations are quickly controlled. Arenas should be placed in or near cockroach harborage areas, or in areas known to be frequented by cockroaches.
feature_bullets: Advion cockroach bait arena provides complete control of cockroach colinies with the active ingredient indoxacarb.
The bait's slow-acting active ingredient provides enough time for cockroaches to transfer it throughout the colony by touching and indirectly through feeding on feces or poisoned carcasses.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,870 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
